moddb.boxes module¶

class moddb.boxes.CommentList¶

Bases: list

Represents a list of comments. Inherits and works like a regular list but has an additional method called ‘flatten’ used to get all the nested children in a list

append(object) → None -- append object to end¶
clear() → None -- remove all items from L¶
copy() → list -- a shallow copy of L¶
count(value) → integer -- return number of occurrences of value¶
extend(iterable) → None -- extend list by appending elements from the iterable¶
flatten() → List[moddb.boxes.Comment]¶

Returns a ‘flattened’ list of comments where children of comments are added right after the parent comment so:

[ Comment1 ]
├── Comment2 | ├── Comment4 | └── Comment5 └── Comment3

would become:

[Comment1, Comment2, Comment4, Comment5, Comment3]

Returns:The flattened list of comments
Return type:list[Comment]
index(value[, start[, stop]]) → integer -- return first index of value.¶

Raises ValueError if the value is not present.

insert()¶

L.insert(index, object) – insert object before index

pop([index]) → item -- remove and return item at index (default last).¶

Raises IndexError if list is empty or index is out of range.

remove(value) → None -- remove first occurrence of value.¶

Raises ValueError if the value is not present.

reverse()¶

L.reverse() – reverse IN PLACE

sort(key=None, reverse=False) → None -- stable sort *IN PLACE*¶
class moddb.boxes.Statistics(html)¶

Bases: object

The stats box, on pages that have one. This represents total stats and daily stats.
